oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Maize diseases: A guide for field identification
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Charcoal
Dwarfism
Fusarium
Penicillium
Viruses
Smuts
Necrosis
Zea mays
Kernels
Leaf area
Rots
Nigrospora
Plant diseases
Cephalosporium
Bacterial diseases
Mildews
Fungi disease
Botryodiplodia
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Intended for field use by agricultural technicians and maize farmers, this pocket-size manual carries descriptions and color photographs for more than 50 fungal, bacterial, viral, and mollicute diseases that affect the maize crop worldwide, with basic information on pathogens and symptoms. A diagnostic key facilitates quick identification of diseases and their effects. In this fourth edition, nomenclature has been updated. new diseases and information added, and improved photographs included.
